# Add verbose flag to distribution helpers

Date: 2026-01-07

## Summary
- Added `verbose` parameter to `instant_distribution` (numerical-only) and `verify_distributions` (numerical + analytical comparison).
- All existing prints (signal summaries, numerical stats, analytical-vs-numerical stats) are gated by `verbose`; default remains True for backward compatibility.
- Propagated `verbose` through the internal call from `verify_distributions` to `instant_distribution`.

## Files Modified
- THESIS/src/analysis/data_representations/data_representations.py

## Testing
- Not run (print-gating only; functional logic unchanged).
